20020001.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>에레다</> 문파에 가고 싶은데, 어디 있는지 알아요?
20020001.English_Text: I want to go to <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ereda</> Munpa, do you know where it is?
20020001.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>埃雷达</> 我想去蒙帕,你知道在哪里吗?

20020002.Original_Text: 그건 왜 묻는 거요? 듣자하니... 반달호수에서 무술대회를 망친 난동꾼들이 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>에레다</> 문파를 찾고 있다던데 댁들이구만?
20020002.English_Text: Why are you asking that? Let's hear it... I heard that the rioters who ruined the martial arts competition at Lake Vandal are looking for the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ereda</> sect. Gum?
20020002.Chinese_Text: 你为什么问这个?让我们听听……破坏万达尔湖武术比赛的暴徒正在寻找<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>艾瑞达</>氏族.你呢?

20020004.Original_Text: 됐수다! 저리들 가쇼! 에잉~ 가뜩이나 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>거미줄</>도 부족해서 속 시끄러운데, 어디서 시정잡배까지 나타나서는...
20020004.English_Text: Okay! Let's go there! Ew~ It's already noisy because there isn't enough <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Cobweb</>, but even a miscellaneous boat shows up...
20020004.Chinese_Text: 就是这样！我们走吧！呃~里面已经很吵了,因为<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>蜘蛛网</>不够,还出现了一只淘气的小船……

20020005.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>에레다</> 문파가 어디 있냐구요? 글쎄요.. <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>에레다</> 문파는 원래부터 비밀리에 활동하던 조직이라서요. 정확한 위치를 아는 건 아무도 없을걸요?
20020005.English_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ereda</> Where's the clan? Well... <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ereda</> The Munpa is an organization that has been operating secretly from the beginning. No one knows the exact location, right?
20020005.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>埃雷达</> 部落在哪里?嗯... <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>埃雷达</> 因为氏族从一开始就是一个秘密组织.有谁知道具体位置吗?

20020006.English_Text: But you didn't get close to <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>discipline</> at one time?
20020006.Chinese_Text: 尽管如此,您还是没有一度与<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>纪律</>关系密切?

20020007.Original_Text: 그랬죠. 해월 대륙을 개척할 당시에는 우리 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</> 탐사대와 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>에레다</> 문파는 긴밀하게 협조했었습니다.
20020007.English_Text: Yeah. At the time of pioneering the continent, our <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Weeping</> expedition and <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ereda</> The clan worked closely together.
20020007.Chinese_Text: 我做到了.当我们开拓大陆时,我们的<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>西部</>探险队和<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>埃雷达</>氏族密切合作.我做到了.

20020008.Original_Text: 하지만 지금은 몇몇 사건으로 사이가 틀어져서 각자의 노선을 타고 있어요.
20020008.English_Text: But now, due to some incidents, they are on their own separate routes.
20020008.Chinese_Text: 但是现在,由于几起事件,情况发生了变化,我们走上了各自不同的道路.

20020010.English_Text: By the way, what are you looking for in <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ereda</> clan?
20020010.Chinese_Text: 但是您在 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>埃雷达</>中寻找什么?

20020013.English_Text: Give me one piece of tough silk.
20020013.Chinese_Text: 请给我一块坚韧的丝绸.

20020014.Original_Text: 이런.. 질긴 비단이라면 마침 똑 떨어져서요. \n이 ‘평범한 비단’은 어떠십니까?
20020014.English_Text:
Oh, if it's tough silk, it just falls off.
How about this 'plain silk'?
20020014.Chinese_Text:
哦,天哪,如果它是坚韧的丝绸,它就会掉下来. 
 这个‘普通丝绸’怎么样?

20020015.English_Text: I don't need anything other than 'Tough Silk'
20020015.Chinese_Text: 除非它是“坚韧的丝绸”,否则你不需要它.

20020016.English_Text: But it's because finding <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Cobweb</> is a star in the sky.
20020016.Chinese_Text: 但是要塞 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Cobweb</> 是天空中的星星.

20020017.Original_Text: 그거야 제 알바 아니죠. \n없으면 그냥 갈래요. 다음에 올게요.
20020017.English_Text:
That's not my part-time job. 
If not, I'll just leave. I'll come next time.
20020017.Chinese_Text:
那不是我的职责. 
 没有的话我就走了.下次我会来.

20020018.Original_Text: 에레다? <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>에레다</> 문파를 찾고 있다는 녀석들이 너희들이야?
20020018.English_Text: Ereda? <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ereda</> Are you guys looking for a clan?
20020018.Chinese_Text: 艾瑞达? <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>埃雷达</> 你们在寻找氏族吗?

20020020.Original_Text: 에비, 저리들 가라, 가! 너희들하고 괜히 얽혔다가는 나만 곤란해질라.
20020020.English_Text: Ebi, go away, go! If I get tangled up with you guys, I'll be in trouble.
20020020.Chinese_Text: 伊薇,走开,走！如果我和你们纠缠不清,只有我一个人有麻烦.

20020022.English_Text: Aww! Do you want to go there?
20020022.Chinese_Text: 哦,太好了！你会去那里吗?

20020023.Original_Text: 아무래도 정보를 쉽게 구할 수 있을 것 같진 않아.
20020023.English_Text: I don't think the information will be readily available.
20020023.Chinese_Text: 我认为这些信息不容易获得.

20020025.Original_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>거미줄</>? 아하! <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>거미줄</>을 가져다주면서 물어보자는 거지? 좋은 생각인데?
20020025.English_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Cobweb</>? Aha! You're going to ask for <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Cobweb</>? Is that a good idea?
20020025.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>蜘蛛网</>?啊哈！ <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>你要给我一个网</>然后问?好主意?

20020026.Original_Text: 좋았어! <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>거미줄</>은 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>거미 숲 길</>에서 구할 수 있을 거야. 어서 가보자!
20020026.English_Text: Good! <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Cobweb</> can be found at <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Spider Forest Path</>. Let's go!
20020026.Chinese_Text: 好的！ <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>蜘蛛网</>可以在<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>蜘蛛森林小径</>找到.我们走吧！

20020027.English_Text: What <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Cobweb</> is this? Hmmmm, what do you want?
20020027.Chinese_Text: 这是什么 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>蜘蛛网</>?嗯,你想要什么?

20020028.Original_Text: 알잖아요. <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>에레다</> 문파를 가려면 어떻게 해야 해요?
20020028.English_Text: You know. How do I get to the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ereda</> clan?
20020028.Chinese_Text: 你懂. <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>埃雷达</> 我怎么去蒙帕?

20020029.Original_Text: 그건... 알겠수다. 대신 나중에 후회해도 원망하지 마쇼.
20020029.English_Text: That's... I understand. Instead, don't complain if you regret later.
20020029.Chinese_Text: 那是……我明白了.相反,即使以后后悔也不要受到责备.

20020031.Original_Text: ... <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>에레다</> 문파를 찾고 싶으면 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>동부생태 조사림</>으로 가보쇼. 그럼 그들이 찾아올거외다.
20020031.English_Text: ... <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ereda</> if you want to find a clan <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Eastern Ecological Forest</> Let's go to. Then they will come.
20020031.Chinese_Text: ... <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>艾瑞达</> 如果你想找一个氏族,去<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>东方生态森林</>.然后他们会来

20020036.Original_Text: 아아, 공짜로는 안되죠. \n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>에레다</> 문파를 가고 싶은데... 어떻게 해야해요?
20020036.English_Text:
Ah, it's not free. 
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ereda</> I want to go to the school... What should I do?
20020036.Chinese_Text:
唉,不是免费的. 
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>埃雷达</> 我想去学校……我该怎么办?

20020037.English_Text: Ummm... good. I'll let you know.

20020039.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>에레다</> 문파는 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>동부생태 조사림</>을 가보면 만날 수 있을 거다. \n단, 위험해도 난 모른다?
20020039.English_Text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ereda</> You can find the monpa at <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Eastern Ecological Forest</> 
However, I don't know if it's dangerous?
20020039.Chinese_Text:
前往<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>东方生态林</>即可找到<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>艾瑞达</>. 
但是不知道有没有危险?

20020040.Original_Text: 그건 우리가 알아서 할 테니 걱정마세요. 고맙습니다!
20020040.English_Text: Don't worry, we'll take care of that. Thank you!
20020040.Chinese_Text: 别担心,我们会处理的.谢谢你！

20020041.Chinese_Text: 哦,伙计……你看到了意想不到的人.

20020043.Original_Text: 도대체 이게 어찌 된 일이십니까? \n저희 문주님을 공격한 걸로도 부족해 이젠 저희 문파를 정탐하십니까?
20020043.English_Text:
What on earth is this? 
It's not enough just to attack our Munju, are you now scouting our clan?
20020043.Chinese_Text:
这到底是怎么回事? 
 攻击我们文珠还不够,你现在是在侦察我们族吗?

20020045.Original_Text: 저희 문파는 왜 조사하고 다니신 겁니까?
20020045.English_Text: Why did our clan go around investigating?
20020045.Chinese_Text: 为什么我们的氏族调查?

20020046.Original_Text: 그거야 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>에레다 문주</>만이 해 줄 수 있는 일이 있거든.
20020046.English_Text: That's it, because there's something only <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Munju Ereda</> can do for you.
20020046.Chinese_Text: 那是因为只有 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Munju Ereda</> 可以为您做一些事情.

20020049.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>파사</>님이요!?? 하아... 애들 장난도 아니고 도대체 왜 이러십니까... \n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>파사</>님은 신수이십니다. 만나고 싶다고 만날 수 있는 분이 아니라구요.
20020049.English_Text:
It's <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pasa</>!?? haha... I'm not kidding, why the hell are you doing this... 
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pasa</> is a divine beast. It's not someone you can meet just because you want to meet him.
20020049.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pasa</>!??哈哈……这不是小孩子的玩笑,你为什么要这样做…… 
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pasa</>是神兽.我不是那种你想见就见的人.

20020050.Original_Text: 하지만 방법은 있잖아? 대대로 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>에레다</> 문파는 자신의 신수인 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>파사</>에게 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>제</>를 올려 계시를 받는 다는 걸 알고 있다구.
20020050.English_Text: But is there a way? From generation to generation <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ereda</> Munpa is their divine beast <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pasa</> I know I get a revelation by posting <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>I</> to.
20020050.Chinese_Text: 但是有办法吗?一代又一代,<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>埃雷达</>被赋予了他们的神兽,<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pasa</>,<textColor= [255:204:102:255]>我知道你通过上传我的内容获得启示</>.

20020051.Original_Text: 그건... 그래봤자 소용 없습니다. 어차피 제는 문주님만이 행할 수 있고, \n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>하름</>님이시라면 현재 칩거중으로 아무와도 만나지 않고 계십니다.
20020051.English_Text: That's... it's useless anyway. Anyway, I can only do this for Master Moon, and if you are <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Hareum</>, you are currently on a chip. You haven't even met him.
20020051.Chinese_Text:
那……反正也没用.毕竟只有Jum Moon能做到这一点,如果是
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Hareum</>,他现在正在休息,没有遇到任何人.

20020052.English_Text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Hareum</>? <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Hareum</>Is this still Moonju? 
He didn't run away was it?
20020052.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>哈雷姆</>? <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Hareum</>这还是文珠吗? 
你没有逃跑吗?

20020054.English_Text: You don't know the identity of <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Hareum</>?

20020056.Original_Text: 음... 그렇단 말이지... 좋아! 그럼 문주의 정체는 우리가 밝혀줄게. \n대신 넌 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>파사</>를 만나게 해줘. 알았지?
20020056.English_Text:
Um... That's right... Okay! Then we'll reveal Moonju's identity. 
Instead, let me meet <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pasa</> . Understand?
20020056.Chinese_Text:
嗯……没错……好吧！那么我们就来揭开文珠的真实身份吧. 
 相反,让我见见<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pasa</>.理解?

20020057.Original_Text: 그러니까 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>제</>라는 건 그냥 올릴 수 있는 게 아니라...
20020057.Chinese_Text: 所以,<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>my</> 不是你可以上传的东西......

20020058.Original_Text: 알았어, 알았어. 그럼 준비가 다 되면 다시 보자구!
20020058.English_Text: Okay, okay. See you when you're ready then!
20020058.Chinese_Text: 好吧好吧.那么当你准备好时再见！

20020059.Original_Text: 그럼 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>제</>를 올릴 재료 준비를 하면 되는 거지? \n근데 재료가 뭐야?
20020059.English_Text:
Then I can prepare the material for <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>I</>, right? 
But what is the material?
20020059.Chinese_Text:
那我只需要为<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>I</>准备素材,对吗? 
 但是成分是什么?

20020061.Original_Text: 이런, 그것부터 알아봐야 하는 구나. 아마 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>제</>에 관련된 거라면 영교원의 바롱들이 알고 있을 거야. <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>풍요 우림 조사 거점</>에 가 보자.
20020061.English_Text: Hey, you should look into that first. If it's related to <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>I</>, the barongs of Young Gyowon will know. <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Let's go to the Abundance Rainforest Research Base</>.
20020061.Chinese_Text: 哦,伙计,你应该从那里找出来.如果跟<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>I</>有关的话,小乔元的男爵大概会知道.我们去<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>丰饶雨林研究基地</>.

20020064.Original_Text: 영교원은 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>신수를 부르는 제사</>에 대해서 알고 있지?
20020064.Chinese_Text: Young Gyowon 知道<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>神圣的祝福</>?

20020065.Original_Text: 흐음~ 그거야 알고 있다냥. 대대로 기록으로 전해 내려오고 있다냥! \n근데... 그걸 네가 어찌 아냥?
20020065.English_Text:
Hmm~ I know that. It has been passed down as a record from generation to generation! 
But... how do you like that?
20020065.Chinese_Text:
嗯~这个我知道.代代相传,记录在案！ 
 但是……怎么处理呢?

20020068.Original_Text: 아, 그게 아니라 암튼, 그래서 재료가 뭐야?
20020068.English_Text: Ah, it's not, anyway, so what's the material?
20020068.Chinese_Text: 哦,不是这样,反正成分是什么?

20020069.English_Text: Ummm... I don't like it. I don't want to teach you!
20020069.Chinese_Text: 嗯...我不喜欢它.我不想教你！

20020071.Original_Text: 맨입으로는 가르쳐주지 않겠다냥! \n게다가 반말하는 인간은 더 싫다냥!
20020071.English_Text:
I won't teach you barefoot! 
Besides, I hate people who talk nonsense even more!
20020071.Chinese_Text:
我不会光着嘴教你的！ 
 而且,我更讨厌胡说八道的人！

20020073.Original_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>아랑</>을 말리며 무엇을 가져다 주면 되겠냐고 묻는다)
20020073.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Arang</> 问我可以给你带来什么)

20020074.Original_Text: 넌 말이 좀 통하는구냥. 그럼 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>개다래풀</>을 가져다 달라냥. \n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>개다래풀</>을 가져다 주면 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>제사</>에 대해서 알려주겠다냥.
20020074.English_Text:
You speak a little bit. Then I want you to bring me a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Actilla grass</>. 
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]> If you bring me the ragweed</>, I'll tell you about <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Jesus</>.
20020074.Chinese_Text:
你好像会说话.然后,给我带来<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>胃痛</>. 
 如果你给我带来<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Gastriae</>,我会告诉你<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>神圣仪式</>.

20020075.English_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Little grass</>? Where do you get the grass?
20020075.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>胃母科</>?你从哪里弄到这种杂草?

20020077.Original_Text: (이번엔 바롱을 진정시키며 어디서 구할 수 있는지 다시 묻는다)
20020077.English_Text: (This time calms Barong and asks again where he can get it)
20020077.Chinese_Text: (这次让巴龙镇定下来,又问从哪里可以拿到)

20020078.Original_Text: 흠흠. <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>개다래풀</>은 도화상전에 가면 구할 수 있을 거다냥. \n그럼 기다리고 있겠다냥.
20020078.English_Text:
Hmmmm. <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Gaestrogen</> will be available at the drawing show. 
Then I'll wait for you.
20020078.Chinese_Text:
嗯嗯.去画展可以获得<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Gaedrae草</>. 
那我等你.

20020079.Original_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>개다래풀</>이요? \n허허, 바롱들이 자주 찾아서 종종 들여오곤 했었는데.
20020079.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>胃痛</>? 
呵呵,巴龙人经常发现,带了进来.

20020081.Original_Text: 말은 끝까지 들어보셔야죠. \n종종 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>개다래풀</>을 들여오긴 했지만 이번엔 풍랑 탓에 들여오지 못했습니다.
20020081.English_Text:
You should listen to the end. 
Occasionally we brought in <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Gasperilla</>, but this time we couldn't bring it in due to a storm.
20020081.Chinese_Text:
你必须听最后. 
 我经常带<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Gaestrogen</>,但这次因为暴风雨没能带进去.

20020083.Original_Text: 네, 그렇죠. 제가 지금 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>개다래풀</>이 없다는 말이죠. 하하하.
20020083.English_Text: Yeah, that's right. I don't have <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Gingertail</> right now. Hahaha.
20020083.Chinese_Text: 是的.这意味着我现在没有 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>姜草</>.哈哈哈.

20020084.Original_Text: 아... 그렇게까지 실망하실 거까지는... 거참... 좋습니다. 제가 쟁여놓은 게 딱 하나 남았는데 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>녹각다귀의 뿔</>을 좀 구해다 주시면 드리겠습니다.
20020084.English_Text: Ah...until you're so disappointed... that's great... good. I only have one left, <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Anger's Horn</> If you can find some, I'll give it to you.
20020084.Chinese_Text: 啊……直到你失望为止……那……很好.我只剩下一个了,如果你能给我一些<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>鹿角</>,我就给你.

20020085.Original_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>녹각다귀의 뿔</>! 좋아요, 그거 어디서 구할 수 있어요!?
20020085.English_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Antagonist Horn</>! Okay, where can I get that!?
20020085.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>愤怒号角</>！好的,我在哪里可以得到它！?

20020086.Original_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>녹색 뿔의 숲</>에 가보시면 발에 차이는 게 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>녹각다귀</> 일 겁니다.
20020086.English_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>If you go to the green horned forest</>, you'll get a kick in the foot <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Ring antler</> > will be.
20020086.Chinese_Text: 如果你去<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Green Horn Forest</>,你会发现踢的是<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Antwerp</>.

20020087.English_Text: Okay. I'll save you, so just wait!
20020087.Chinese_Text: 我知道了.等着吧,我来救你！

20020090.Original_Text: 아차차, 미안하다냥. 내가 잠시 정신을 놓았다냥. 약속은 지키겠다냥.
20020090.English_Text: Oops, I'm sorry. I lost my mind for a moment. I'll keep my promise.
20020090.Chinese_Text: 哎呀对不起.好像我已经冷静了一段时间.我会遵守诺言的.

20020091.Original_Text: 일단, 신수를 부르는 “<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>천신제례</>”는 길을 부르는 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>방울</>, 길을 비추는 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>거울</> 그리고 길을 만드는 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>검</>! 이렇게 세가지 재료가 필요하다냥.
20020091.English_Text: First of all, the “<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Heavenly God Festival</>” that calls the divine beast is the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Bell</>, <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>mirror</> to light the path, and <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>sword</> to make the path! Nyan.
20020091.Chinese_Text: 首先,召唤神兽的“<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>天神节</>是<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>铃</> ,它照亮了道路.<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Mirror</> 和 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Sword</> 使道路！你需要这三种成分.

20020092.Original_Text: 각 재료는 우리 영교원을 제외한 나머지 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>사호</>들이 가지고 있다냥.
20020092.English_Text: Each material is owned by <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Saho</> except for our Young Gyowon.
20020092.Chinese_Text: 除我们的青年教师外,所有材料均归 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Saho</> 所有.

20020093.Original_Text: 흐음.. 그럼 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>사호</>들을 찾아가서 받으면 되는 거야?
20020093.English_Text: Hmm.. Then, can I go to the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Saho</> and get it?
20020093.Chinese_Text: 嗯.. 那么,我可以去 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Saho</> 获取它们吗?

20020094.Original_Text: 그게 끝이 아니다냥. 신수를 부르는 일은 그만큼 중요한 일이라 나라의 허가를 받아야 한다냥.
20020094.English_Text: That's not the end. Singing a divine beast is so important that you need to get permission from the country.
20020094.Chinese_Text: 就像这不是结束召唤神兽就那么重要,需要得到国家的许可.

20020095.Original_Text: 에에? 지금 나보고 풍제국이라도 갔다오라는 거야?
20020095.English_Text: Eh? Are you telling me to go to the Pung Empire right now?
20020095.Chinese_Text: 嗯?你是要我现在就去风济王国吗?

20020096.Original_Text: 으이고 바보다냥. <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</>이 있지 않냥. <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>해월대륙</>은 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</>이 국가의 권한을 위임받아 수행하고 있다냥. 그러니 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</>에게 허락을 구하면 된다냥.
20020096.English_Text: Oh, I'm stupid. <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>There is no ram</>. <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Sea Moon continent</> <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Discipline</> is doing this under the authority of the state, so please ask permission from <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Foster</> You can save it.
20020096.Chinese_Text: 哦,像个傻瓜.没有 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>ram</>. <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>海月大陆</> <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>纪律</>被赋予国家执行的权力.所以,只要向 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>The ram</> 请求许可.

20020097.Original_Text: 뭐야, 결국 재료랑 허락도 우리가 받아내야 한다는 거잖아.
20020097.English_Text: Well, after all, it means we have to get the materials and permission as well.
20020097.Chinese_Text: 嗯,毕竟,我们也必须得到材料和许可.

20020098.Original_Text: 뭐... 암튼 난 약속은 지켰다냥. 그럼 행운을 빈다냥!
20020098.English_Text: Well... Anyway, I kept my promise. Good luck then!
20020098.Chinese_Text: 嗯……不管怎样,我信守诺言.那么祝你好运！

20020099.Original_Text: 그럼 본격적으로 재료를 구해볼까? 나 없어도 잘 할 수 있지?
20020099.English_Text: Then let's get the ingredients in earnest? Can you do well without me?
20020099.Chinese_Text: 那么,我们要不要开始寻找材料?没有我你能过得好吗?

20020101.Original_Text: 하하, 그래. 재료를 다 구하면 거점에서 만나.
20020101.English_Text: Haha, yes. I'll meet you at the base when I get all the ingredients.
20020101.Chinese_Text: 哈哈 是的当您准备好所有食材后,我们将在基地与您会面.

20020103.English_Text: (I think I'll have to find another way)
20020103.Chinese_Text: (我想我必须找到另一种方式)

20020104.Original_Text: 거점 북쪽의 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>녹각다귀</>들이 소란을 일으키고 있어 고민입니다. \n예전 같으면 협력 문파들이 나서서 도와줬을 텐데... 요즘은 사이가 좋지 못해 그들에게 도움을 청하기도 힘이 드네요.
20020104.English_Text:
I'm worried about the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>green crow</> making a commotion in the north of the base. 
In the past, the cooperative clans would have stepped in to help... Now It's hard to ask them for help because we're not on good terms.
20020104.Chinese_Text:
我担心基地北边的<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>绿色鹿角</>会引起骚动. 
以前合作的氏族会出来帮忙……现在,我们关系不好,很难向他们求助.

20020105.English_Text: (Ask why you're not on good terms)

20020106.Original_Text: 예전에 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</>이 협력 문파들의 신뢰를 잃는 일이 있었다고 합니다.  \n아마도 윗선에서 무슨 일이 있었던 듯 한데... 정작 곤란한 건 밑에 있는 우리들이니...
20020106.English_Text:
It is said that <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Discipline</> had lost the credibility of the cooperative sects in the past. 
Probably something happened at the top... The trouble is that we are down there...
20020106.Chinese_Text:
据说在过去,<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>纪律</>已经失去了合作者的可信度. 
也许上层发生了什么事……但下层的人是我们自己……

20020108.English_Text: Really? Thank you so much... Thank you!
20020108.Chinese_Text: 真的吗?我不能非常感谢你......谢谢你！

20020110.Original_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>버려진 감시탑</>에서 물자를 옮기는 중인데... 일손이 너무 부족해서요.
20020110.English_Text: I am moving supplies from <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Abandoned Watchtower</>... I'm short on staff.
20020110.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>我正在从废弃的瞭望塔运送补给品</>...我人手不足.

20020112.Original_Text: 본래는 협력 문파원들이 남아있기로 했었는데 어찌된 일인지 그들이 감시탑을 비워버려서요. \n그 뒤로 저희가 감시탑에 남아 있는 물자를 꾸준히 옮기고는 있는데... 저희들만으로는 힘이 드네요.
20020112.English_Text:
Originally, we were supposed to have cooperating clan members, but somehow they emptied the watchtower. 
Since then, we have been constantly moving the remaining materials in the watchtower... It's hard on our own.
20020112.Chinese_Text:
最初,它应该留在合作者那里,但不知何故他们清空了瞭望塔. 
 从那以后,我们一直在稳步移动瞭望塔里剩下的材料……我们一个人很难.

20020115.Original_Text: 대장님과 만나고 싶다고? 갑자기 나타나서는 무슨 뚱딴지 같은 소리야.
20020115.English_Text: You want to meet the captain? It sounds like some kind of idiot when you suddenly appear.
20020115.Chinese_Text: 你想见船长吗?它突然出现,听起来像是某种狗屎.

20020117.Original_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>허가증</>이 뭔지는 모르겠고. 너 같이 뭐도 아닌 사람을 우리 대장님이 왜 만나겠어. 썩 저리가!
20020117.English_Text: I don't know what a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>permit</> is. Why would my boss meet someone like you who is nothing. How far away!
20020117.Chinese_Text: 我不知道 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>permit</> 是什么.为什么我们的船长会遇到一个和你完全不同的人?那么远！

20020118.Original_Text: 흠흠, 뭐 이런 걸 받아서 대장님께 말씀 드리는 건 아닐세. \n자네가 워낙 뛰어난 인재같아 보여서 말이지. 크흠흠.
20020118.English_Text:
Hmmmm, I don't think I'm going to tell the general about something like this. 
You seem like a very talented person. Khhhhh.
20020118.Chinese_Text:
嗯,这不像我拿着这个告诉船长. 
 因为你看起来是个很有才华的人.大哼.

20020119.Original_Text: 듣자하니, 자네가 우리 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</>을 많이 도왔다고 하더군. \n아무 이유없이 그런 행동을 하진 않았을테고... 무얼 원하는 거지?
20020119.English_Text:
I heard you said that you helped our <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Weeping</> a lot. 
You wouldn't do that for no reason... what you want Beggar?
20020119.Chinese_Text:
我听说你说你对我们的<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>哭泣</>帮助很大. 
你不会无缘无故的……你想要什么?

20020120.English_Text: (Says that you need a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Permit</> for <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Heavenly Rites</>)
20020120.Chinese_Text: (他们说您需要<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>许可证</>才能持有<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>天礼</>)

20020121.Original_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>천신제례</>? 신수를 부르겠다? 하! 그 당돌함만은 세계 제일이라 칭할 수 있겠구나.\n허나, <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>천신제례</>의 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>허가증</>을 얻기 위해서는 자격증명이 필요하네. 해당 시련을 자네가 통과할 수 있을까?
20020121.English_Text:
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Cheonshin Festival</>? Are you going to sing a divine beast? Ha! You can only call it the best in the world for its boldness.
But, <textColor= [255:204:102:255]>You need credentials to get the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>permit</> of the>Cheonshinjeri</>, can you pass the ordeal? ?
20020121.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>天礼</>?我要叫神吗?在下面！单是它的胆量就可以称得上是天下第一了.
不过,<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>天神节</> <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>允许</>你需要凭证才能获得.你能渡过那难关吗?

20020123.Chinese_Text: 好的.你在哪里看到你的技能?

20020124.Original_Text: 흠. 제법 근성이 있는 자로구나. \n좋다. <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>허가증</>을 내어주도록 하지. 여기 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>허가증</>일세.
20020124.English_Text:
Hmm. He's a pretty tough guy. 
Good. Give me your <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Permit</>. Here <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Permit</>First.
20020124.Chinese_Text:
唔.他是一个相当硬朗的人. 
好. <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>给我你的许可</>.这里<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>允许</>首先.

20020126.Original_Text: 자네가 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>신수</>를 불러낼 수 있을지는 모르겠네만, \n행여라도 그들을 만나게 되면 이것 하나만 물어봐 주겠나?
20020126.English_Text:
I don't know if you'll be able to summon <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sacred Beast</>, but 
If you ever meet them, would you mind asking me this one thing?

20020128.Original_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>불마</>가 세상을 이리 어지럽히고 있건만, 부정한 존재를 멸하는 것이 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>신수</>의 도리임에도 불구하고 어찌하여 모습을 드러내지 않는 것인지 말이네.
20020128.English_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Bulma</> is messing up the world, but destroying the unclean is <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>The Divine Beast</ Even though it's the way of >, why doesn't it show up?
20020128.Chinese_Text: 尽管<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>布尔玛</>正在搅乱世界,但消灭不洁是<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>神兽</>的职责> 你怎么不出现?

20020130.English_Text: Come on, let's go get the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Permit</>. Bilge.
20020130.Chinese_Text:
现在,去获取<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>许可证</>. 
 希望<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>耶稣</>会成功.

20020131.Original_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>! 또 뵙는군요. \n이번엔 또 무슨 행사를 망쳐놓으셨습니까?
20020131.English_Text:
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>! Nice to meet you. 
What else did you mess with this time?

20020133.English_Text: I'm joking. What happened to you?
20020133.Chinese_Text: 这是一个笑话.你来这里是为了什么?

20020135.Original_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>길을 부르는 방울</>이라면... <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>매화령</>을 말씀하시는 것 같군요. \n이유를 여쭤도 되겠습니까?
20020135.English_Text:
If <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>The bell that calls the way</>... the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Maehwa Spirit</> Looks like it.
Can I ask why?
20020135.Chinese_Text:
如果是 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Bell 指路</>...我想你在谈论 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Maehwa Spirit</> >. 
 请问为什么?

20020136.English_Text: (<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>He says that he wants to open a ritual</>)

20020137.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>신수</>님을 부른다는 말씀입니까? 정말이지... 소협은 매번 저를 놀라게 하시는군요. \n흐음... 좋습니다. 허나...
20020137.English_Text:
You mean calling <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Shinsu</>? Really... Sohyeok surprises me every time. 
Hmm... good .But...
20020137.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Shinsu</>你是说那个吗?说真的...... Sohyeop总是让我感到惊讶. 
 嗯……不错.然而...

20020139.Original_Text: 저희 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>신입 단원</>이 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>혈비패</>에게 잡혀있다고 합니다. \n이 문제를 해결해주시면 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>매화령</>을 빌려드리지요.
20020139.English_Text:
Our <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>new member</> is said to have been captured by <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Blood Plaque</>.
 If you solve this problem, I will lend you <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Maehwaryeong</>.
20020139.Chinese_Text:
我们的<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>新成员</>被<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>血斑</>捕获. 
如果你解决了这个问题,我就借给你<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Maehwarying</>.

20020140.Original_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>매화단</>이 나서면 충분히 구할 수 있지 않으냐고 묻는다)
20020140.English_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Plum flower bed</> asks if you can get enough)

20020141.Original_Text: 저희가 나설 수도 있으나 마침 소협이 오셨으니 손을 빌리려고 하는 거지요. \n소협의 실력이야 제가 잘 알고 있으니까요. 그럼 부탁드립니다.
20020141.English_Text:
We could go out, but we're just going to borrow a hand because the small cooperative has arrived. 
I am well aware of the small cooperative's skills. So please.
20020141.Chinese_Text:
我们可以出去,但我们要借一只手,因为一小群人刚到. 
 因为我很清楚小合作的技能.那么请

20020142.English_Text: You are here. I have heard from the manager.
20020142.Chinese_Text: 你在这里.我从经理那里听说了.

20020144.Original_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>혈비패</>와 자주 충돌이 있었지만 그저 시비정도에 불과했습니다. \n그런데 이번에 저희 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>신입</>이 납치를 당하는 일이 발생했습니다.
20020144.English_Text:
There were frequent clashes with <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Blood Plaque</>, but it was only an argument. 
But this time, our <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Rookie</> has been kidnapped.
20020144.Chinese_Text:
与 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Bloodplate</> 经常发生冲突,但这只是一场争论. 
但这一次,我们的<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>菜鸟</>被绑架了.

20020146.Original_Text: 정확한 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>신입</>의 위치는 숲에서 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>정예단원</>을 만나 물어보시면 될 것 같습니다.
20020146.English_Text: For the exact location of <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>rookie</>, meet <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Elite member</> in the forest and ask It seems to be.
20020146.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>菜鸟</>的具体位置,可以在森林里遇到<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>精英会员</>询问.

20020147.Original_Text: 어서 오십시오. 기다리고 있었습니다. \n바로 말씀드리면 저희 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>신입</>은 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>혈비패 기지 안쪽</>에 잡혀있습니다. 그럼 부탁드리겠습니다!
20020147.English_Text:
Welcome. We've been waiting. 
In short, our <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>rookies</> are <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Blood Plaque It's held inside the base</>. Then please!
20020147.Chinese_Text:
欢迎.我在等待. 
马上告诉你,我们的<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>新人</>被关押在<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>血传基地内</>.那么请！

20020148.English_Text: (Ask if you want to go with me)

20020149.Original_Text: 제가 나서면 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>혈비패</>와 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>매화단</>의 문제로 일이 번질 수 있습니다.
20020149.English_Text: If I do, things will become a problem with <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Blood Plaque</> and <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Plum Flower Bed</> can.
20020149.Chinese_Text: 如果我这样做,<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>血斑</>和<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>梅花床</>会导致问题.

20020150.English_Text: (make sure you mean solve it yourself)

20020154.English_Text: (Ask if you knew he was coming)

20020155.Original_Text: 저희 단원들이 사람이 올 거라고 신호를 보냈습니다. \n흠... 저희 단원들이라면 충분히 저를 구할 수 있었을 텐데... 참 이상합니다.
20020155.English_Text:
My members signaled that someone was coming. 
Hmm... my members would have been able to save me enough... It's strange.
20020155.Chinese_Text:
我们的成员表示有人要来了. 
嗯……我的成员们能救我就够了……这很奇怪.

20020157.English_Text: Is that so? Let's go first.

20020159.English_Text: (Ask if this was planned in the first place)
20020159.Chinese_Text: (问问这是否是一开始的计划.)

20020161.English_Text: (Ask if you used yourself to attack <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Blood Plaque</>)

20020162.Original_Text: 역시 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>님. 그렇습니다. \n근래들어 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>혈비패</>의 횡포가 점차 심해지고 있어 방법을 강구하던 참이었습니다.
20020162.English_Text:
Also, <textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>. 
Recently, <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>blood The tyranny of defeat</> was getting worse and worse, so I was trying to figure out a way.
20020162.Chinese_Text:
同样来自 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>.这是正确的. 
最近<textColor=[215:94:94:255]><textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Blood Viper</>的暴政越来越严重,我也在想办法.

20020163.Original_Text: 그러나 저희 매화단이 직접 움직이면 자칫 큰 싸움으로 번질 수 있으니 고민하고 있었습니다.
20020163.English_Text: However, if our plum blossoms move directly, we were worried that it could escalate into a big fight.
20020163.Chinese_Text: 但是,如果我们的梅花直接动起来,我们担心会升级为一场大战.

20020164.Original_Text: (자신을 이용한 건 불쾌하나, 영리한 방법이었다고 말한다)
20020164.English_Text: (He said it was offensive, but he said it was clever)
20020164.Chinese_Text: (他说用他很不愉快,但他说这是一个聪明的方法)

20020165.Original_Text: 그렇게 말씀해주시니 감사합니다. \n대신이라고 하긴 뭐하나, 보답으로 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>매화령</>을 빌려드리지요.
20020165.English_Text:
Thank you for saying that. 
What would you say in return, I'll lend you a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Maehwaryeong</> in return.
20020165.Chinese_Text:
谢谢你这么说. 
代替你说什么?作为回报,我会借给你<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Maehwarying</>.

20020168.Original_Text: 오, 이게 누구신가. <textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></> 아니신가. \n<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>해월대륙</>으로 간다는 이야기는 들었네만, 여기서 보게 될 줄이야.
20020168.English_Text:
Oh, who is this? <textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></> not. 
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]> I've heard that you're going to the Sea and Moon Continent</>, but I'm sure you'll see it here.
20020168.Chinese_Text:
哦,这是谁<textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></> 不是吗? 
 我听说你要去<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>海月大陆</>,但你会在这里看到.

20020169.Original_Text: 나야 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>도화상전</> 확장을 위해 대륙을 넘어왔다지만... \n자네는 여긴 어쩐일인가? 게다가 난 왜 찾아왔고?
20020169.English_Text:
It's me, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>I came across the continent to expand <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Drawings</>... 
What are you doing here? Besides, why did I come here?
20020169.Chinese_Text:
是我<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Daehwajeon</> 我穿越大陆来扩张... 
你在这里做什么?还有,我怎么来了?

20020170.Original_Text: (사정이 있어 넘어왔고, 그를 위해 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>길을 비추는 거울</>이 필요하다 말한다)
20020170.English_Text: (He came over for some reason, says he needs a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Mirror to illuminate the way</>)
20020170.Chinese_Text: (他出于某种原因过来说他需要一个<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>镜子来照亮道路</>)

20020171.Original_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>길을 비추는 거울</>...? <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>도화경</> 말인가?\n자네, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>신수</>를 부를 계획인가 보지?
20020171.English_Text:
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Mirror to illuminate the way</>...? <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Pastel</>?
You, do you think you are planning to sing <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Shinsu</>?

20020173.Original_Text: 하하, 반가운 이의 부탁이라면 얼마든지 들어주고야 말고. \n그러나 자네가 알아야 할 게 있네. <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>도화경</>은 대대로 내려오는 물건이 아니네.
20020173.English_Text:
Haha, feel free to accept any request from a welcome person. 
But there is something you should know. <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>The Flower Sutra</> is a It's not a thing.
20020173.Chinese_Text:
哈哈,别怕听好人的要求. 
 但是有些事情你应该知道. <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>《花经》</>不是代代相传的东西.

20020175.Original_Text: 만들어야 한다는 말일세. <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>도화경</>은 특별한 토양을 구워 만드는 물건으로, \n한번 사용하면 깨져서 못쓰게 된다네. 필요할때 만들어 한번만 사용하는 물건이란 의미지.
20020175.English_Text:
I mean, you have to make it. <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Flower Sutra</> is an item made by roasting special soil. 
Once used, it will break and become unusable. Make it when you need it. It means something that can only be used once.
20020175.Chinese_Text:
我的意思是,你必须做到. <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>《花经》</>是用特殊的泥土烘烤而成的物品 
一旦用过,就会破碎无法使用.这意味着它是在需要时制作且仅使用一次的物品.

20020176.Original_Text: 대신 만드는 건 간단해서, <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>재료</>만 있으면 우리 상인들이 알아서 해 줄 걸세.
20020176.English_Text: It's easy to make instead, all you need is <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Materials</> and our merchants will take care of it for you.
20020176.Chinese_Text: 制作起来很简单,所以您只需要<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>材料</>,我们的商家会为您处理.

20020178.Original_Text: 그렇다면야 간단하지. <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>재료</>는 어디보자... \n그래, <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>메마른 늪지</>에서도 구할 수 있을걸세.
20020178.English_Text:
It's that simple. Let's see the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Material</>... 
Yeah, <textColor=[110:216:175:255]> You can also find them in the Withered Swamp</>.
20020178.Chinese_Text:
那么事情就没有那么简单了.我们来看看<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>材料</>... 
是的,你也可以从<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>干旱沼泽</>获取.

20020179.Original_Text: 마침 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>도화경</>을 제작할 줄 아는 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>공예가</>가 이곳 거점에 있으니 이야기해보게. 미리 얘기해두겠네.
20020179.English_Text: Finally, a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>craftsman</> who knows how to craft <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Pascals</> is here at this base. Let's talk about it. I'll tell you in advance.
20020179.Chinese_Text: 这个基地有一个<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>工匠</>,他知道如何制作<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>花经</>,所以我们来谈谈关于它.我会提前和你谈谈.

20020180.Original_Text: 상전주님께서 보내신 분이시군요. \n어서 오십시오. 구하시는 물건은 제가 만들어 드리겠습니다.
20020180.English_Text:
You are the one sent by your master. 
Please come. I will make the items you are looking for.
20020180.Chinese_Text:
你是主所差来的那一位. 
请来.我会做你想要的.

20020182.Original_Text: 저야말로 잘 부탁드립니다. 재료는 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>메마른 늪지</> 가장 안쪽에 있는 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>검은 모래</>를 가져오시면 됩니다. 가시는 길에 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>인면충</>이 있으니 조심하시구요.
20020182.English_Text: Please take good care of me. The material is <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Withered Swamp</> innermost <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Black Sand Just bring </>. Be careful as there are <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>human insect </> on the way.
20020182.Chinese_Text: 祝你顺利.材质是<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>干枯沼泽</>最里面的<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>黑沙</>.途中有 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Insect Insect</>,请小心.

20020184.Original_Text: 휴 살았네요. 다른게 아니라 저희는 이곳에 모래를 채집하러 왔는데...\n글쎄, <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>인면충</> 때문에 돌아갈 길이 막혔지 뭡니까. 소협께서 좀 도와주십쇼.
20020184.English_Text:
Huh, I'm alive. Nothing else, we came here to gather sand...
Well, <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Lymphoma</nobr> blocked the way back. What is it? Sohyup, please help me.
20020184.Chinese_Text:
嘿,我还活着没什么,我们来这里捡沙子…… 
好吧,<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Insect Insect</> 挡住了回去的路.请帮助我一点.

20020186.English_Text: Thank you! Thank you so much, Sohyeop!
20020186.Chinese_Text: 谢谢你！非常感谢你,苏协！

20020187.Original_Text: 무사히 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>재료</>를 가져오셨군요. \n제가 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>다른 재료</>를 준비할 동안 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>모래</>를 손질해 주시면 감사하겠습니다.
20020187.English_Text:
You have safely retrieved <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Material</>. 
I have <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Other material</> I would appreciate it if you could polish the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>sand</> while preparing.
20020187.Chinese_Text:
您已安全携带<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>材料</>. 
如果您能在我准备<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>其他材料</>的同时清理<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>沙子</>,我将不胜感激.

20020188.English_Text: The necessary tools are out there.
20020188.Chinese_Text: 那里提供了必要的工具.

20020189.Original_Text: 자, 여기 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>도화경</>입니다. \n도와주신 덕분에 수월하게 만들 수 있었습니다.
20020189.English_Text:
Well, here is <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Hwahwagyeong</>.
Thanks for your help, I was able to make this easily.
20020189.Chinese_Text:
所以,这里是 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Pastel</>. 
 多亏了你的帮助,我才得以轻松完成.

20020191.Original_Text: 별말씀을요. 그럼 하시는 일이 잘 되길 기원합니다.
20020191.English_Text: Tell me something. I wish you the best of luck.
20020191.Chinese_Text: 别客气.所以我希望你过得很好.

20020194.Original_Text: 해월대륙은 좀 어때? 동방대륙이랑은 또 다르지? \n혹시 일자리를 찾고 있다면 내가 얼마든지 주선해줄게.
20020194.English_Text:
How's the Sea and Moon Continent? It's different from the Eastern Continent?
If you are looking for a job, I'll arrange it for you.
20020194.Chinese_Text:
海月大陆怎么样?和东方大陆有什么不同? 
如果你正在找工作,我会为你安排.

20020195.English_Text: (He says he's looking for a sword that makes a way)

20020196.Original_Text: 우리 철문의 보검, <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>금경철검</>을 말하는 거야? \n뭐... 못 빌려줄 것도 없지.
20020196.English_Text:
You mean our iron gate treasure sword, <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Golden light iron sword</>? 
Well... there's nothing you can't lend.
20020196.Chinese_Text:
你说的是我们铁门宝剑<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>金光铁剑</>? 
嗯……没有什么不能借给你的.

20020197.Original_Text: 그런 눈빛으로 본다고 내가 빌려줄... 수 있긴 해. \n하지만 지금은 내가 여력이 안 돼. 나중에 다시 오는 건 어때?
20020197.English_Text:
If you see with those eyes, I can lend you... 
But I can't afford it right now. How about coming back later?
20020197.Chinese_Text:
如果你用那双眼睛看着我,我可以借给你…… 
 但是现在,我买不起.晚点回来怎么样?

20020199.Original_Text: 흠 그러면 이건 어때? 내가 재료 찾는 일을 도와줘. \n그 일만 마무리 되면 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>금경철검</>을 빌려줄게.
20020199.English_Text:
Hmm, how about this? Help me find the ingredients. 
Once I'm done, I'll lend you the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Golden Sword</>.
20020199.Chinese_Text:
嗯,这个怎么样?帮我找材料. 
作品完成后,我会把<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>金京哲剑</>借给你.

20020201.Original_Text: 말이 잘 통해서 좋네. 그럼 암각다귀의 뿔부터 구해줘. 날카롭고 견고해 재료로 손색이 없지. \n암각다귀는 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>골짜기 바람길</>에서 찾을 수 있을 거야.
20020201.English_Text:
You talk well. Then, get the horn of the rock crow first. It is sharp and sturdy, making it an excellent material. 
The petroglyph <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Valley Wind Road</> you will find it.
20020201.Chinese_Text:
用词很好.然后,先得到岩鸦的角.它锋利而坚固,是一种极好的材料. 
 你可以在<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Valley Windway</>找到岩鸦.

20020202.Original_Text: 다른 재료들은 그 뒤에 하나씩 말해줄게.
20020202.English_Text: I'll tell you the other ingredients one by one after that.
20020202.Chinese_Text: 之后我会一一告诉你其他成分.

20020203.Original_Text: 휘유... 재료가 좀 많았는데 금방 처리했네. 인정!
20020203.English_Text: Volume... There were a lot of ingredients, but I got it done right away. Admit it!
20020203.Chinese_Text: 汽油……我有很多配料,但我很快就完成了.认出！

20020205.Original_Text: 그랬나? 정신없이 일하다 보니 시간 가는 줄 몰랐네. \n자, 여기 약속한 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>금경철검</>이야.
20020205.English_Text:
Is that so? I was so busy working, I didn't realize the time passed. 
Now, here's the promised <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Golden Sword</>.
20020205.Chinese_Text:
你是否?工作太忙了,无意识到时间在流逝. 
现在,这是承诺的<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>金剑</>.

20020206.Original_Text: 초대 철문주님께서 직접 만드신 보검이니 상처없이 돌려줘야돼!
20020206.English_Text: It is a treasured sword that the first Lord of Iron Gate made himself, so you must return it without any damage!
20020206.Chinese_Text: 是第一代铁门之主亲手打造的宝剑,一定要无损归还！

20020211.Original_Text: 재료 준비도 끝났고, 이제 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>하름</>의 정체를 밝혀낼 일만 남았네!
20020211.English_Text: The ingredients are ready, now all that remains is to uncover the identity of <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Harum</>!
20020211.Chinese_Text: 材料准备好了,现在剩下的就是揭开<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Harum</>的身份！

20020212.English_Text: (The preparation of the heart is finished, so let's go now)

20020213.English_Text: Okay! Do you want to go to <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Secret Point</>?

20020215.Chinese_Text: 如何?就是这样…………怎么回事?

20020216.Original_Text: 이런, 가는 길을 모르네? 그러고 보니 우리 그땐 납치당해서 끌려갔었구나... \n그럼 이제 어떡하지? 어떻게 가지?
20020216.English_Text:
Hey, don't you know where to go? Come to think of it, we were kidnapped back then and dragged away... 
Now what? How do we get there?
20020216.Chinese_Text:
嘿,你不认识路吗?想想看,当年我们被绑架带走了…… 
 那我们现在怎么办?怎么去

20020217.Chinese_Text: (告诉 Youngkyowon 的 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>PerongPerong</> 我们走吧)

20020218.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>퍼롱퍼롱</>? 아! 그들은 한번 갔던 곳은 축지술을 펼칠 수 있으니까? \n그래! 좋은 생각이야. 그런데... <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>퍼롱퍼롱</>은 어디 있는데?
20020218.English_Text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Perong-Per-Long</>? Oh! They can do chuk-jitsu in a place they've been to once? 
Yeah! That's a good idea. But... Where is <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>PerongPerong</>?
20020218.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>每长每长</>?啊!因为他们可以在他们曾经去过的地方做楚克地艺术? 
对！好主意.但是... <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>PerongPerong</> 在哪里?

20020222.Original_Text: 나도 반갑다냥!! 이렇게 만나다니 인연이다냥! \n어디서 밥이라도 같이 먹자냥!
20020222.English_Text:
Nice to meet you too!! Meeting like this is a relationship! 
Let's eat together somewhere!
20020222.Chinese_Text:
我也很高兴见到你！！就像这样遇见你！ 
一起吃米饭吧！

20020223.Chinese_Text: (在说是之后,它会询问 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>PerongPerong</> 在哪里)

20020224.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>퍼롱퍼롱</>님 말이다냥? \n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>퍼롱퍼롱</>님은 지금 다른 바롱들이랑 함께 약초를 찾으러 가셨다냥.
20020224.English_Text:
You mean <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>PerongPerong</>?
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>PerongPerong</> is now It's like you went to find herbs with other barongs.
20020224.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>PerongPerong</>你是说? 
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Perong Perong</> 现在和其他巴龙一起去寻找草药.

20020226.Original_Text: 거긴 말이다냥, 여기서 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>해가 비치는 쪽으로 쭈욱 가면 나오는 곳</>이다냥. \n바람의 손짓에 끌려가거나, 꽃향기를 따라가도 나온다냥.
20020226.English_Text:
It's like that, here <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>if you keep going towards the sun, you'll come out</>. 
Be dragged by the wind or follow the scent of flowers It's like you're going.
20020226.Chinese_Text:
就是这样,这里<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>如果你继续朝着太阳走,你会找到它</>. 
即使被风吹动或追随花香也会散发出来.

20020227.Chinese_Text: ......没有人可以通过这种方式找到它.

20020228.Original_Text: 어째서냥? 이보다 더 정확한 방법이 어디 있다고... \n아! 그럼 내가 이동시켜 주겠다냥!
20020228.English_Text:
Why? Is there a more accurate method than this... 
Ah! Then I'll move you!
20020228.Chinese_Text:
为什么?还有比这更准确的方法吗... 
啊！那我给你搬！

20020229.English_Text: What? Oh no! It's absolutely fine!
20020229.Chinese_Text: 什么?不好了！永远不好吗！

20020230.Original_Text: 헤헤, 사양할 것 없다냥! 그럼 시작한다냥?!
20020230.English_Text: Hehe, there's nothing to give up! Then let's start?!
20020230.Chinese_Text: 呵呵,我无话可说！那我们开始吧?！

20020233.Original_Text: (이런 위험한 곳에 왜 혼자 있냐고 묻는다)
20020233.English_Text: (Ask why you are alone in such a dangerous place)
20020233.Chinese_Text: (问你为什么一个人在这么危险的地方)

20020234.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>퍼롱퍼롱</> 할아버지랑 약초를 캐다가냥, \n길을 잃고 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>뱀버섯</>들한테 쫓겨서 오가지도 못하고 이렇게 있었다냥.
20020234.English_Text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Perongperong</>I was digging for herbs with my grandfather,
Lost <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Snake It was like this because I was chased by mushrooms</> and couldn't come and go.
20020234.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Perongperong</> 和爷爷一起挖药,
迷路了,<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>蛇菇</>被踢出去了不能来来去去.

20020236.Original_Text: 할아버지를냥? 할아버지는 지금 바롱들과 함께 약초를 캐고 계신다냥.
20020236.English_Text: Like Grandpa? He's digging herbs with the Barongs right now.
20020236.Chinese_Text: 像爷爷?爷爷现在正在和巴龙人一起挖草药.

20020238.English_Text: Leave it to me. <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Since you defeated the snake mushrooms</>, I'll take you back.
20020238.Chinese_Text: 交给我<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>既然你打败了蛇蘑菇</>,我就带你回去.

20020240.Original_Text: 아가야! 그러잖아도 걱정하던 참이었다. \n어찌 된 일이더냐?
20020240.English_Text:
Baby! By the way, I was just worried. 
What happened?
20020240.Chinese_Text:
亲爱的！尽管如此,我还是很担心. 
 怎么了?

20020242.English_Text:
Thank you so much... 
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>, thank you.

20020243.English_Text: (It's not a big deal, so don't worry about it)
20020243.Chinese_Text: (这没什么大不了的,所以不要担心)

20020244.Original_Text: 그럴 수야 없지 않겠나. 그러잖아도 여기, 이 소협에게 들었네. \n<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>에레다 문파 비밀 거점</>에 가려고 한다고?
20020244.English_Text:
I can't do that. But, here, I heard from this small group. 
You're going to <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Ereda Clan Secret Point</>?
20020244.Chinese_Text:
不可能,不是吗?即便如此,在这里,我还是从这个小团体那里听到的. 
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>你想去艾瑞达家族的秘密基地</>?

20020245.English_Text: (Answers yes and asks if there is any way)

20020246.Original_Text: 쉽진 않겠지만 그곳에 있었던 물건이 있다면 그 기운을 따라 축지 길을 열어줄 수 있을 걸세.
20020246.English_Text: It won't be easy, but if you have the items there, you will be able to follow the energy and open the way for you.
20020246.Chinese_Text: 这并不容易,但如果你拥有那里的东西,你将能够跟随能量并打开道路.

20020250.Original_Text: 이 녀석이랑 내가 줄곧 그곳에 잡혀 있다 왔거든.
20020250.English_Text: This guy and I have been arrested there all along.
20020250.Chinese_Text: 这个人和我一直在那里.

20020251.Original_Text: 허허, 그렇군. 물건이 아닌 살아있는 존재로는 해본적이 없지만... 어떻게든 해보겠네. \n단단히 준비해야 할 거야. 준비가 다 되면 말하게.
20020251.English_Text:
Heh heh, that's right. I've never done it with a living being other than an object... but I'll try something. 
You'll have to be well prepared. Let me know when you're ready.
20020251.Chinese_Text:
呵呵,原来如此.我从来没有用非对象做过,但是......我会尝试. 
准备充分.当你准备好时告诉我.

20020252.Original_Text: 준비는 다 됐는가? 늙은이의 실력을 한번 펼쳐보겠네.
20020252.English_Text: Are you ready? Let's show off the skills of an old man.
20020252.Chinese_Text: 你准备好了吗?让我给你看看一个老头的技能.

20020253.English_Text: We have to go down first, so let's go!
20020253.Chinese_Text: 我们必须先下去,所以我们走吧！

20020255.Original_Text: 자, 그럼 한번 가볼까? 퍼롱 퍼롱 퍼로로냐~앙!
20020255.English_Text: Well then, shall we go? Perrong Perrong Peroronya~ ang!
20020255.Chinese_Text: 那么,我们走吧? Perrong Perrong Peroronya~！

20020256.Original_Text: (다행이지만 다음에는 좀 더 안전하게 다니자고 말한다)
20020256.English_Text: (Thankfully, but next time I'll tell you to go more safely)
20020256.Chinese_Text: (还好他们说下一次,让我们走得更安全)

20020257.Original_Text: 그래, 그래. 알았다고. 다음부터는 확실한 방법으로 다닐게. \n그럼 이제 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>하름</>의 정체를 밝히면 되지? 들키지 않게 조심해!
20020257.English_Text:
Yeah, okay. I got it. From now on, I'll go about it in a sure way. 
Now, can I reveal the identity of <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hareum</>? Be careful not to get caught!
20020257.Chinese_Text:
是的是的我就知道.从今往后,我会踏踏实实的走下去. 
现在,我们可以透露<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hareum</>的身份了吗?小心不要被抓住！

20020258.English_Text: (I'm not going with you, asks where are you going)
20020258.Chinese_Text: (我不跟你一起去,问你要去哪里)

20020259.Original_Text: 네가 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>천신제례</>의 재료를 찾아다닐 동안 내가 놀지 않았다는 증거를 가져오려고.
20020259.English_Text: To bring you proof that I didn't play while you were looking for the ingredients for <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Heavenly God</>.
20020259.Chinese_Text: 为您提供证据,证明您在寻找<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>天堂仪式</>的成分时我没有玩.

20020261.English_Text: There is such a thing. See you later!

20020262.Original_Text: 문주님!! 당신들 이게 대체 무슨 짓입니까!
20020262.English_Text: Munju!! What the hell are you guys doing!
20020262.Chinese_Text: 月亮大人！！你们到底在干什么！

20020263.English_Text: Is this what you guys were talking about!?

20020265.English_Text: Yeah, yes, stab <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hareum</> with <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>real name</> and you'll find out. !
20020265.Chinese_Text: 他,是的,<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>真名</>,刺伤<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hareum</>,你就会被揭露！

20020267.Original_Text: 그래도 한때 문주로 모셨던 자입니다. \n마지막은 저희 손으로 처리할 수 있도록 허락해 주십시오.
20020267.English_Text:
Nevertheless, he is the one who once served as the monarch. 
Please allow us to deal with the last one.
20020267.Chinese_Text:
尽管如此,他还是曾经担任过文殊的人. 
请允许我们手工处理最后一个.

20020271.Chinese_Text: 幸运的是,该.如果是这样,<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hareum</> 是...

20020272.English_Text: I have seen it. <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Oreum</> is being cleaned up.
20020272.Chinese_Text: 揭示了你所看到的<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Rising</> 正在清理中.

20020275.Original_Text: 실은... 저희들은 이미 몇 해 전부터 이상한 낌새를 느끼고 있었습니다. \n허나 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>오름</>님께선 자신이 따르는 자에 있어 의심을 품는 건 옳지 않다고 하셔서...
20020275.English_Text:
Actually... We've been feeling strange for a few years already. 
But <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Oreum</> is suspicious of those you follow. He said that it is not right to embrace...
20020275.Chinese_Text:
事实上……我们已经感觉奇怪好几年了. 
但是,<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Oreum</> 说对他关注的人有怀疑是不对的……

20020277.English_Text: Thank you for your last consideration.

20020278.Original_Text: 뭘... 원래부터 이렇게 이야기 되었던 거잖아.
20020278.English_Text: What... it's been talked about like this from the beginning.
20020278.Chinese_Text: 什么……从一开始就是这样.

20020279.English_Text: (Ask if this was planned in advance)
20020279.Chinese_Text: (询问这是否是提前计划好的.)

20020280.Original_Text: 당연하지! 네가 재료를 찾아 다니는 동안 \n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>오름</>과 이번 일을 진행하느라 내가 얼마나 고생했는 줄 알아?
20020280.English_Text:
Of course! Do you know how hard I worked with 
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Oreum</> while you were looking for ingredients?
20020280.Chinese_Text:
当然！你知道我在找材料的时候用
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Oreum</>有多努力吗?

20020281.Original_Text: 아, 맞다! 그럼 이제 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>천신제례</>는 어떻게 되는 거야?
20020281.English_Text: Ah, that's right! So now what happens to <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Cheonshin Ritual</>?
20020281.Chinese_Text: 啊对！那么现在<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>天礼</>会发生什么?

20020282.Original_Text: 문주의 자리가 비었으니, 부문주인 제가 진행할 수 있습니다.
20020282.English_Text: Since Moonju's seat is vacant, I can proceed as the department head.
20020282.Chinese_Text: 文珠的席位空着,我这个科长就可以继续了.

20020283.English_Text: I'm glad. Can I ask you a favor then?
20020283.Chinese_Text: 感谢上帝.那我可以问你吗?

20020284.Original_Text: 두 분께선 저희 문파를 위해 큰 일을 해주셨습니다. 응당 은혜를 갚아야지요.  \n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>천신제례</>를 올릴 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>경천단</>은 비원 뒷편에 있습니다.
20020284.English_Text:
The two of you have done a great job for our clan. We should repay the favor. 
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]><textColor=[ for the celestial rite</> 110:216:175:255]>Gyeongcheondan</> is behind the Biwon.
20020284.Chinese_Text:
你们两个为我们的氏族做了很棒的工作.你必须报答恩情. 
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]><textColor=[110:216:175:255]>庆川团</>举行仪式</>在Biwon的后面.

20020285.English_Text: I'll bring the necessary ingredients and follow up.
20020285.Chinese_Text: 我们会带上必要的材料并跟进.

20020286.English_Text: What is this!!!!! Did you really go?
20020286.Chinese_Text: 这是什么！！！！！你真的去了吗

20020287.Original_Text: 이런... 노여움을 푸십시오. <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>신수</>는 본디 인간계에 관여하지 않습니다. \n일개 인간의 물음에 대해 화를 내지 않은 것만도...
20020287.English_Text:
Oh my gosh... let go of your anger. <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>The Divine Beast</> is not inherently involved in the human realm. 
Don't get angry at a human question. Even if it wasn't...
20020287.Chinese_Text:
哦,天哪... 放下你的愤怒. <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>神兽</>与人类世界无关. 
 只是对人类的问题不生气......

20020288.Original_Text: 일개 인간이라니! 이 녀석의 어머니와 관련된 일이라고!
20020288.English_Text: A human being! It has to do with his mother!
20020288.Chinese_Text: 你是一个人！跟这家伙的妈妈有关！

20020291.English_Text: Ew, I did all my hard work...

20020292.Original_Text: 도움이 못 되어 드려 죄송합니다. 오늘 일은 안타까우나, 앞으로라도 저희 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>에레다</> 문파의 도움이 필요하게 되면 언제든 말씀 주십시오.
20020292.English_Text: I'm sorry I couldn't be of any help. I'm sorry for today, but if you ever need help from our <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ereda</> clan, please let me know. .
20020292.Chinese_Text: 很抱歉没有提供任何帮助.今天很抱歉,但如果您需要我们 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>埃雷达</> 氏族的帮助,请告诉我.

20020294.English_Text: (Farewell to <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Oreum</>, struggling to hide his regrets)

20020295.Original_Text: 그럼 다시 뵐 날을 기다리고 있겠습니다.
20020295.English_Text: Then I look forward to seeing you again.
20020295.Chinese_Text: 那么我们期待再次见到您.

20020298.Original_Text: 에이, 표정 풀어~ 분명 다른 방법이 있을거야.
20020298.English_Text: Hey, relax your expression~ There must be another way.
20020298.Chinese_Text: 哎,放开你的表情~一定有别的办法.

20020300.Original_Text: 난 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>비옥</>을 찾으러 가볼까 하는데.. 넌 어떡할래?
20020300.English_Text: I'm going to go find <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Fertility</>... what are you going to do?
20020300.Chinese_Text: 我要去寻找<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>生育能力</>...你要做什么?

20020301.English_Text: (He says he wants to take a moment to think)

20020302.Original_Text: 그래. 그것도 좋겠다. \n좀 쉬다 보면 좋은 생각이 떠오를거야. 그치?
20020302.English_Text:
Yeah. That'd be nice too. 
You'll come up with a good idea after a bit of rest, right?
20020302.Chinese_Text:
好的.我也希望如此
 如果你休息一下,好的想法就会涌上你的心头.是不是?

20020304.Original_Text: 오, 소협이시군요! 어쩐 일이시죠? \n아아, 준비하신다던 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>천신제례</>는 잘 지내셨나요?
20020304.English_Text:
Oh, you're small! What's going on? 
Ah, how was the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Cheonshin Festival</> you were preparing?
20020304.Chinese_Text:
哦,你是个胆小鬼！你在干嘛? 
啊,你准备的<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>天神节</>怎么样?

20020306.Original_Text: 아... 그렇군요. 많이 기대하셨을텐데, 제가 다 아쉽네요.
20020306.English_Text: Ah... that's right. You must have expected a lot, but I'm sorry.
20020306.Chinese_Text: 原来如此.你一定有很多期待,但我为一切感到抱歉.

20020307.English_Text: (He says he wants to cool his head a little)

20020308.Original_Text: 그러실 수 있죠. <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>해월대륙</>에 넘어오셔서부터 쭉 달려오셨을테니까요. \n<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>안개 숲 개척지</>에서 남쪽으로 내려가면 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>참고요숲</>이 있습니다.
20020308.English_Text:
You can. <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>You must have been running since you came over to the continent</>. 
<textColor=[110:216:175:255 ]>If you go south at the Fog Forest Frontier</> you will find <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Reference Forest</>.
20020308.Chinese_Text:
你可以. <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>自从来到海月大陆</>,你一定一直在奔跑吧. 
 从<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>迷雾森林边境</>向南走,会发现<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>参考森林</>.

20020309.Original_Text: 소협께서 조용히 머리를 식히실 수 있는 장소였으면 좋겠네요.
20020309.English_Text: I hope it's a place where you can quietly cool your head.
20020309.Chinese_Text: 我希望这是一个可以让你安静地冷静下来的地方.

20020311.Original_Text: 아이고 덕분에 살았습니다. 아, 저는 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>낙원계곡</> 입구로 가고있었습니다. \n그곳 거점에 물건을 팔러 가고있었습니다.
20020311.English_Text:
I lived thanks to Aigo. Oh, I was on my way to the entrance to <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Paradise Valley</>. 
I was going to sell things there.
20020311.Chinese_Text:
多亏了伊戈,我才活了下来.哦,我正在前往<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>天堂谷</>入口的路上. 
去基地卖东西.

20020313.Original_Text: 이미 여기가 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>참고요숲</>입니다. \n아! 좀 더 고요한 곳을 찾는 다면 이쪽으로 쭉 가시면 됩니다.
20020313.English_Text:
Already, this is <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Reference Forest</>. 
Ah! If you are looking for a quieter place, just keep going this way.
20020313.Chinese_Text:
这已经是<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>参考森林</>. 
啊！如果您正在寻找更安静的地方,请继续往这边走.

20020316.Original_Text: 여기까지 올 수 있는 걸 보니, 그녀의 아이가 맞는가 보구나.
20020316.English_Text: Looking at how far you can come, it must be her child.
20020316.Chinese_Text: 看你能走到这一步,一定是她的孩子.

20020317.Chinese_Text: (现在告诉我关于你妈妈的事)

20020318.Original_Text: 이미 알겠지만, 네 어머니는 나와 같은 신수 중 하나였던 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>노이</>였다. \n생명을 관장하고 세상을 사랑하던... 따스한 자였어.
20020318.English_Text:
As you may already know, your mother was <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Noi</>, one of the divine beasts like me. 
The one who governed life and loved the world... warm I was sleeping.
20020318.Chinese_Text:
您可能已经知道,您的母亲是 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Noi</>,像我这样的神兽之一. 
他是一个温暖的人,负责生活,热爱世界.

20020319.Original_Text: 그런 그녀였기에 네 아비도 사랑할 수 있었던 거겠지.
20020319.English_Text: Because she was such a woman, your father could have loved you too.
20020319.Chinese_Text: 因为她是这样的女人,你爸爸一定也爱你.

20020320.English_Text: (Ask if you know about your father)

20020321.Original_Text: 알다마다. 니 아비는 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>수라</>였다. \n그리고... 네 어미를 죽였지.
20020321.English_Text:
Aldamada. Your father was <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Sura</>. 
And... you killed your mother.
20020321.Chinese_Text:
阿尔达马达.你的父亲是<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>苏拉</>. 
 还有……我杀了你妈妈.

20020323.Original_Text: 듣지 않아도 상관없다. 어차피 보게 될 테니.
20020323.English_Text: It doesn't matter if you don't listen. You'll see it anyway.
20020323.Chinese_Text: 不听也没关系反正你会看到

20020324.Original_Text: 애당초 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>수라</>와 같이 부정한 자를 곁에 두는 것이 아니었다. \n그러나 그녀는 세상의 모든 걸 포용했지. 그리고 그게 이 결과를 가져왔다.
20020324.English_Text:
Initially, it wasn't like <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Sura</> to have an unclean person by her side. 
But she embraced everything in the world. And that has resulted in this. came.
20020324.Chinese_Text:
首先,就像 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Sura</> 一样,这不是关于有一个不洁的人在你身边. 
 但她拥抱了世界上的一切.这带来了这个结果.

20020326.Original_Text: 네 모습을 보거라. 너도 이미 알고 있지 않느냐.
20020326.English_Text: Look at yourself. You already know that.
20020326.Chinese_Text: 看着你你不是已经知道了吗

20020327.English_Text: (but... asks if it was really his father)
20020327.Chinese_Text: (但是……他问是不是真的是他父亲)

20020328.Original_Text: 어미의 기억에서 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>붉은 옥</>을 보았느냐? \n그건 네 아비가 항상 차고 다니던 것이다.
20020328.English_Text:
Did you see <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Red Jade</> in your mother's memory? 
That's what your father always wore.
20020328.Chinese_Text:
您是否在母亲的记忆中看到了<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Red Jade</>? 
 那是你父亲常穿的.

20020329.Original_Text: 그 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>홍옥</>이 떨어져 있었던 것, 그리고 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>수라</>의 존재... \n네 어미는 네 아비가 죽인 것이야!
20020329.English_Text:
That <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>carnelian</> was off, and the existence of <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Sura</>.. .
Your mother was killed by your father!
20020329.Chinese_Text:
那<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>玛瑙</>陨落,<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>苏拉</>的存在…… 
你妈你爸杀了你！

20020332.Original_Text: 그러니까 네 말은... 네가 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>수라</>와 신수 사이에서 태어난 아이라는 거지? \n그리고 네 어머니를 죽인 사람... 아니 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>수라</>는 네 아버지고?
20020332.English_Text:
So you mean... you're the child of <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Sura</> and Shinsu, aren't you? 
And the one who killed your mother... No <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Sura</> is your father?
20020332.Chinese_Text:
所以你的意思是...你是<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Sura</> 和 Shinsu 的孩子? 
还有那个杀了你妈妈的人……不,<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>苏拉</>是你爸爸吗?

20020333.English_Text: Ummm...but are you sure about that?

20020335.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>노이</>의 기억 속에서 아버지의 모습을 봤을 거 아냐. \n같은 사람이 맞아?
20020335.English_Text:
You must have seen your father in <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Noy</>'s memory.
Is it the same person?
20020335.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>你一定在 Noi 的记忆中见过你的父亲</>. 
 是同一个人吗?

20020336.English_Text: (They say they didn't see exactly what <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Sura</> looked like)

20020337.English_Text: Then you don't know! Don't you?

20020339.Original_Text: 그렇고 말고! 그러니까 이렇게 풀 죽어 있을 게 아니라 직접 확인해 보자. \n네 아버지가 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>수라</>가 맞다면 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>수라</>를 불러서 물어보면 되잖아.
20020339.English_Text:
No way! So let's check it out for yourself instead of being so dead. 
If your father is <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Sura</>, then <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>You can call Sura</> and ask.
20020339.Chinese_Text:
不要这样！所以让我们自己检查一下,而不是完全死了. 
如果你父亲是<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Sura</>,你可以打电话给<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Sura</>询问.

20020341.English_Text: Remember the martial arts competition? You opened a rift.
20020341.Chinese_Text: 还记得武术比赛吗?你打开了裂缝

20020342.English_Text: (Ask if you want to open the rift to summon <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Sura</>)
20020342.Chinese_Text: (询问是否要打开裂缝并召唤<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>苏拉</>)

20020343.Original_Text: 맞아! 그때처럼 균열을 열면 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>수라</>를 불러올 수 있지 않을까? \n어디보자... 그래 저기, 저기가 좋겠다.
20020343.English_Text:
Yeah! If I open the rift like that time, wouldn't it be possible to call up <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Sura</>? 
Let's see... Yeah there, over there.
20020343.Chinese_Text:
对！难道不能像当年那样通过打开裂缝来调用 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Sura</> 吗? 
让我们看看……是的,那边,那边.

20020344.Original_Text: 자, 이제 우리 둘이 싸우면 균열이 열리려나?
20020344.English_Text: Now, if we fight, will the crack open?
20020344.Chinese_Text: 现在,如果我们两个打起来,裂痕会打开吗?

20020345.English_Text: (They tell the story of the two fighting in a martial arts competition)
20020345.Chinese_Text: (他们讲述了两人在一场武术比赛中打架的故事)

20020346.Original_Text: 그렇게 하면 되겠지? \n그럼~ 오랜만에 한 수 부탁해!
20020346.English_Text:
Is it okay to do that? 
Then, please do something after a long time!
20020346.Chinese_Text:
你能做到吗? 
那么,请久等了！

20020348.Original_Text: 이상하다... 왜 안되는 거지? 그때랑 장소가 달라서 그런가? \n아 그래! <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>비옥</>! <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>비옥</>이 없어서 그런가보다!
20020348.English_Text:
Strange... Why not? It's because it's in a different place than it was back then? 
Oh yes! <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Fertility</>! <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>I think it's because of the lack of fertility</>!
20020348.Chinese_Text:
奇怪……为什么不呢?是不是因为那个地方和那个时候不一样? 
 哦对！ <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>生育能力</>！ <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>我认为是因为缺乏生育能力</>！

20020349.English_Text: (<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>fertility</> says it's not the only issue)
20020349.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>生育能力</> 说这不是唯一的问题)

20020350.English_Text:
That's right. It was for <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>fertility</>.
Then you only need to get <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>fertility</> Beggar?
20020350.Chinese_Text:
我知道了.这是因为<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>生育能力</>. 
那我只需要获得<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>生育能力</>,对吗?

20020352.Original_Text: 무슨 소리야~ 날 앞에 두고 그런 말을 해?
20020352.English_Text: What are you talking about~ Are you talking like that in front of me?
20020352.Chinese_Text: 你在说什么?你在我面前这样说话吗?

20020355.English_Text: Welcome, Munju. Nice to meet you after a long time.
20020355.Chinese_Text: 欢迎,月亮大人.好久不见.

20020356.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>비류하</> 사형! 아니 이제 장로님이라고 불러야 하나?
20020356.English_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Biryuha</> Death penalty! Or should I call you Elder now?
20020356.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>飞羽</> 死刑！不,我现在应该叫你长老吗?

20020357.Original_Text: 장로가 된지도 벌써 반년이 지났습니다. \n도대체 언제까지 문파를 버려두실 생각이십니까.
20020357.English_Text:
It has already been half a year since you became an elder. 
How long do you plan to leave the clan behind?
20020357.Chinese_Text:
我成为长老已经半年了. 
 你认为你会离开 Munpa 多久?

20020358.Original_Text: 버려둔 거라니! 식견을 넓히기 위해 세상도 유랑하고! \n음... 또 뭘 했더라...?
20020358.English_Text:
You let it go! Traveling the world to broaden your knowledge! 
Um... What else did you do...?
20020358.Chinese_Text:
你离开了！周游世界,拓宽知识面！ 
嗯……你还做了什么……?

20020360.Chinese_Text: 啊哈哈哈哈……好吧.我就知道.

20020363.Original_Text: 친구!? 친구요??? 이렇게나 반가울데가!!!! \n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>아랑</>님께 드디어 정상적인 친구가 생기다니...
20020363.English_Text:
Friend!? Friend??? It's so nice to see you like this!!!! 
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Arang</> can finally have a normal friend...
20020363.Chinese_Text:
朋友！?朋友???我太高兴了！！！！ 
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>阿让</>终于有一个正常的朋友了...

20020364.English_Text: Isn't it great for the Munpa?

20020365.English_Text: That's... I've got some work to do. Wait...
20020365.Chinese_Text: 那是……我有一些工作要做.就一点点...

20020367.Original_Text: 그게... 제가 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</> 거점책임자와 약조한 게 하나 있습니다. \n나중을 위해 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</>에게 빚을 지워놓는 셈이죠.
20020367.English_Text:
That's... I made a pact with the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Discipline</> Node Manager. 
For later, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>I owe you to foster</>.
20020367.Chinese_Text:
那是...我与 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Discipline</> 节点管理器达成协议. 
 你欠<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Foster</> 供以后使用.

20020368.Original_Text: 역시 사형은 무서운 사람이야. 그래서 무슨 약조인데?
20020368.English_Text: After all, the death penalty is a scary person. So what's the promise?
20020368.Chinese_Text: 死刑也是一个可怕的人.那么是什么药呢?

20020369.English_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Correspondence to remove phlegm from damming swamp</>.
20020369.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>我决定清除少女沼泽中的痰</>.

20020370.Original_Text: 난 또... 뭐야, 간단한 일이잖아. \n그 이야기를 하려고 장소까지 옮긴 거야?
20020370.English_Text:
I'm... what, it's a simple thing. 
Did you move to the location to tell the story?
20020370.Chinese_Text:
我也……嗯,很简单. 
你搬到讲故事的地方了吗?

20020371.Original_Text: 매번 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>아랑</>님의 경향을 보자면, 이번에도 문파에 무언가를 구하러 가시는 것일 터...
20020371.English_Text: If you look at the trend of <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Arang</> every time, you must be looking for something in the clan again this time...
20020371.Chinese_Text: 如果你每次看<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>阿郎</>的走势,那一定是你又要去部落找东西了……

20020373.Original_Text: 그렇군요. 그렇다면... 그 전에 문주로서 하실 도리는 하셔야 겠지요?
20020373.English_Text: That's right. Then... before that, you should do what you're supposed to do, right?
20020373.Chinese_Text: 我知道了.如果是这样的话……在此之前,你应该做你作为文珠应该做的事情,对吧?

20020374.Original_Text: 으으. 뭐지 이 웃으면서 협박하는 느낌은? \n알았어... 다녀 올게.
20020374.English_Text:
Ugh. What is this smiling and intimidating feeling? 
Okay... I'll be back.
20020374.Chinese_Text:
啊这种微笑和恐吓的感觉是什么? 
好的……我去.

20020376.Original_Text: 이미 들으셨겠지만 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>담인초</>가 겉잡을 수 없이 늘어나 \n통행로를 안전하게 이용하는 것 조차 힘든 지경입니다.
20020376.English_Text:
As you may have heard, <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Ginseng</> has grown out of control.
It is difficult to even safely use the aisle.
20020376.Chinese_Text:
你可能已经听说过,<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>人参</>的生长失控.
甚至很难安全地使用通道.

20020377.English_Text: How did it get so big?
20020377.Chinese_Text: 它是怎么增长这么多的?

20020378.Original_Text: 기후 조건이 딱 들어맞은 것으로 추측 중입니다만,\n아무것도 확신할 수는 없습니다.
20020378.English_Text:
I'm guessing the climatic conditions are just right,
but I can't be sure of anything.
20020378.Chinese_Text:
我猜气候条件刚刚好,但
我不能确定任何事情.

20020379.Original_Text: 상부에서는 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>담인초</>를 조사하는 일에 인력을 쓸 수 없다는 입장이라... \n손이 모자란 상태입니다.
20020379.English_Text:
The upper level is in the position that it cannot use manpower to investigate <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Gingerwort</>... 
We are short of hands.
20020379.Chinese_Text:
上层管理人员处于无法动用人力调查<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>恐龙</>的境地... 
我的手不够用.

20020380.English_Text: Can you help me with the investigation then?
20020380.Chinese_Text: 那么,你能帮我调查一下吗?

20020381.Original_Text: 오, 여력이 되신다면 표본을 좀 구해주시면 감사하겠습니다.
20020381.English_Text: Oh, if you can afford it, I'd appreciate some samples.
20020381.Chinese_Text: 哦,如果你能负担得起,如果你能得到一些样品,我将不胜感激.

20020386.Original_Text: 감사합니다! 이걸로 상황이 조금은 일단락 되면 좋겠습니다.
20020386.English_Text: Thank you! I hope this clears things up a bit.
20020386.Chinese_Text: 谢谢你！我希望这能让事情变得清晰一点.

20020388.Original_Text: 자아~ 그럼 시킨 일도 다 끝냈고... <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>풍백문</>으로 돌아가볼까?
20020388.English_Text: Come on, I'm done with all the work... Shall we go back to <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</>?
20020388.Chinese_Text: 来吧,我已经完成了我被要求做的所有工作......我们要回到<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>风白门</>吗?

20020389.Original_Text: 그게요, 문주님. 지금 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>비옥대지</>로 넘어가는 길이 막혔다고 합니다.
20020389.English_Text: That's right, Lord Moon. The way to <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Fertile Land</> is now blocked.
20020389.Chinese_Text: 就是这样,文珠.通往<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>沃土</>的道路现已被封锁.

20020390.English_Text: What kind of bullshit is that?

20020391.Original_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>붉은 비탈</>로 넘어가는 길목에 식인 식물이 자라나 벽을 이뤘다고 합니다. \n하하, 문주님이 오시니 별 일이 다 생기네요.
20020391.English_Text:
It is said that on the way to the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Red Slope</>, cannibals grew and formed a wall. 
Haha, everything happened when Master Moon came. yes
20020391.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>通往红色斜坡的道路</>据说已经长出了食人族形成了一堵墙. 
哈哈,文珠来了,各种事情都在发生.

20020392.Original_Text: 그게 나랑 무슨 상관인데! 하... 이를 어쩐다.
20020392.English_Text: What does that have to do with me! Ha... What about this?
20020392.Chinese_Text: 跟我有什么关系！哈……你是怎么做到的?

20020394.Original_Text: 그럼 문제가 해결된 후에 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>붉은 비탈</>에서 뵙기로 하죠. \n저도 일단 개인적인 용무 좀 보고 오겠습니다.
20020394.English_Text:
Then we'll see you at <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Red Slope</> after the problem is resolved. 
I'll come back with some personal affairs first.
20020394.Chinese_Text:
问题解决后,我们在<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>红坡</> 再见. 
 我先来看看私事.

20020395.English_Text: Okay, see you later at <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Red Slope</>.
20020395.Chinese_Text: 好的,我们稍后在 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>红坡</> 再见.

20020396.Original_Text: 감사합니다! 이걸로 상황이 조금은 일단락 되면 좋겠습니다.
20020396.English_Text: Thank you! I hope this clears things up a bit.
20020396.Chinese_Text: 谢谢你！我希望这能让事情变得清晰一点.

20020398.Original_Text: 자아~ 그럼 시킨 일도 다 끝냈고... <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>풍백문</>으로 돌아가볼까?
20020398.English_Text: Come on, I'm done with all the work... Shall we go back to <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</>?
20020398.Chinese_Text: 来吧,我已经完成了我被要求做的所有工作......我们要回到<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>风白门</>吗?

20020399.Original_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>낙원 계곡</>에도 무언가 일이 벌어지고 있는 모양입니다. \n관심이 있으시면 그곳에 다녀오시는 것도 나쁘지 않을 것 같습니다.
20020399.English_Text:
Something seems to be happening in <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Paradise Valley</> as well. 
If you're interested, it wouldn't be a bad idea to go there.
20020399.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>天堂谷似乎发生了一些事情</>. 
 如果你有兴趣,去那里也不错.

20020401.English_Text: You're here! Are you really ready?
20020401.Chinese_Text: 你在这里！你真的准备好了吗?

20020403.Original_Text: 그럼 출발하겠습니다! 자~ 선원들 각자 위치로!
20020403.English_Text: Then let's go! Now, let's go to our respective positions!
20020403.Chinese_Text: 那我们走吧！现在,让我们去每个船员的位置！

20020404.English_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>, you came to <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Sea Moon Continent</> Is this your first time?
20020404.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>,这是您第一次到<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>海月大陆</>吗?

20020405.Original_Text: 좋았어. 그럼 여긴 나에게 맡겨. 어디... <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>에레다</> 문파부터 찾아가 볼까나?
20020405.English_Text: Okay. Leave this to me, then. Where... <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ereda</> Shall we visit the clan first?
20020405.Chinese_Text: 这很好.然后交给我哪里... <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>埃雷达</> 我们要不要先拜访一下部落?

20020407.Original_Text: 하여간... <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>비류하</> 사형은 예나 지금이나 똑같네. \n장로가 됐다고 해서 달라진 건 없네~
20020407.English_Text:
Anyway... <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Biryuha</> The death penalty is always the same. 
Being an elder doesn't change anything~
20020407.Chinese_Text:
无论如何... <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>飞羽</> 死刑和以往一样. 
 成为长老后,一切都没有改变.

20020409.Original_Text: 그런가~? 하긴 나도 변한게 없네. 하하.
20020409.English_Text: Is that so~? Actually, I haven't changed either. Haha.

20020410.English_Text: (Ask to explain what happened by the way)
20020410.Chinese_Text: (无论如何,请让我解释发生了什么)

20020411.Original_Text: 아, 내가 이야기 안했었지? 하하... 보다시피 난 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>풍백문</>의 문주야. \n난 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>시로</>의 회귀자이고, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>풍백문</>은 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>시로</>가 시초니까.. 당연히 알 줄 알았지...
20020411.English_Text:
Oh, didn't I tell you? Haha... As you can see, I'm the owner of <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</>. 
I'm <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Regressor of Shiro</>, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</> is <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Shiro</> is the beginning... of course I knew...
20020411.Chinese_Text:
哦,我不是告诉你了吗?哈哈……如你所见,我是<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>风白门</>的所有者. 
我是<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>斯隆</>的回归器,<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>风白门</>是<textColor=[78:148:215] :255]>斯隆</> 是开始……当然,我知道……

20020413.English_Text:
Ahaha, I'm sorry. 
Would you like to catch up to the death penalty <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Biryuha</>?
20020413.Chinese_Text:
啊哈哈,对不起对不起. 
那么<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>飞羽</> 追不上死刑?

20020414.Original_Text: (알 수 없는 기운이 흘러나오지만 왠지 모르게 친숙하게 느껴진다)
20020414.English_Text: (Unknown energy flows out, but somehow it feels familiar)
20020414.Chinese_Text: (一股未知的能量流出,却又莫名觉得熟悉)

20020415.Chinese_Text: 那么我们应该去获取<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>生育力</>吗?

20020416.Original_Text: (<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>비옥</>은 쉽게 구할 수 있는 물건이 아니라고 한다)
20020416.English_Text: (<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>fertility</> is said to be not readily available)

20020417.English_Text: I can't believe it... so strong.
20020417.Chinese_Text: 我简直不敢相信..这有多强?

20020418.Original_Text: 너희들은 뭐야!? 그 옷을 보니... <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>에레다 문파원</>들인가? \n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>에레다</> 문파가 왜 우리를 공격하는 거야?
20020418.English_Text:
What are you guys!? Look at those clothes... <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Ereda Clan</>?
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ereda</> Why is the clan attacking us?
20020418.Chinese_Text:
你们是什么人！?看着衣服... <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>艾瑞达氏族成员</>? 
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>埃雷达</> 为什么氏族要攻击我们?

20020419.Original_Text: 그걸 몰라서 묻나? \n너희들이 우리 문주님을 공격해서 해를 입혔지 않느냐!
20020419.English_Text:
Are you asking because you don't know that? 
Didn't you guys attack our Munju and harm us!
20020419.Chinese_Text:
你不知道,所以你问? 
你们不是攻击伤害了我们月主大人吗?

20020420.English_Text: What!? Are you talking about a fight with <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hareum</>?
20020420.Chinese_Text: 什么！? <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>你是在谈论与后宫的战斗吗</>?

20020421.English_Text: Are you admitting that you attacked Master Moon?
20020421.Chinese_Text: 你承认你攻击了月亮大人吗?

20020422.English_Text: But he's not the master of the moon. He's a monster!
20020422.Chinese_Text: 但她不是月亮的主人.这是一个怪物！

20020423.Original_Text: 닥쳐라! 더 이상 문주님을 모욕하면 가만 두지 않겠다!
20020423.English_Text: Shut up! I won't let you insult Munju any more!
20020423.Chinese_Text: 闭嘴！你再侮辱文珠,我不会放过你的！

20020425.Original_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>파사</>가 말한 곳이 여기인 것 같다. 들어가보자)
20020425.English_Text: (I think this is where <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pasa</> was talking about. Let's go in)
20020425.Chinese_Text: (我想这就是 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>帕莎</> 所说的地方.让我们进入它)

20020426.English_Text: Are we going to bring our <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Holy Dragon</> to wake up?!
20020426.Chinese_Text: 我们必须带着我们的 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>和龙</> 醒来?！

20020427.English_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Moonlight Wind</> isn't too hard! Where do you sell Kwak Ho-ryong?!
20020427.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>月光风</>也不容易！郭浩龙哪里有卖?！

20020428.English_Text: I was the first to discover <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Cobweb</>.

20020429.English_Text: I was the one who kicked out the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Spider</> after all!

20020430.Original_Text: 그러지 말고 딱 반만 주시면 안 될까요?\n아, 누님. 저희가 하루 이틀 본 사이도 아니고...
20020430.English_Text:
Can't you just give me half of it?
Oh, sister. We haven't seen each other for a day or two...
20020430.Chinese_Text:
你就不能给我一半吗?
哦,姐姐.我们已经一两天没见面了……

20020431.Original_Text: 아 글쎄, 동생 사정이 딱한 건 나도 알겠는데, 나도 힘들게 구한 거라니까 그러네. \n언제 내가 동생 힘들 때 안 챙겨줬어?
20020431.English_Text:
Ah well, I know that my brother's situation is pitiful, but that's because I also worked hard to find it. 
When did I not take care of my younger brother when he was having a hard time?
20020431.Chinese_Text:
哦,好吧,我知道我弟弟的情况很可怜,但也是因为我也很努力才找到. 
 我什么时候没有照顾弟弟过苦的时候了?

20020432.Original_Text: 암요암요. 챙겨 주셨지요. \n그러니까 이번에도 조금만... 반이 힘들면 반의 반이라도 좀...
20020432.English_Text:
Awkward. They took care of them. 
So again, a little bit... If half is hard, even half of it...
20020432.Chinese_Text:
哦哦哦哦你照顾了它. 
所以这一次,一点点……如果一半是硬,一半是......

20020433.Original_Text: 어허이. 이 사람이! 자꾸 이러면 서로 불편해지는 거야. \n내가 다음에 여력이 될 때 도와주면 될 거 아니야.
20020433.English_Text:
Hey. This person! If you keep doing this, it will make each other uncomfortable. 
The next time I can afford it, I won't be able to help.
20020433.Chinese_Text:
嘿嘿这个人！如果你继续这样做,你会让对方感到不舒服. 
 下次我买得起的时候就忍不住了.

20020434.English_Text: If you say so... I see.

20020438.Original_Text: 불난 집에 부채질하려고 왔어? 들었으면 알 거 아니야.
20020438.English_Text: Are you here to fan a house on fire? You wouldn't know if you heard it.
20020438.Chinese_Text: 你是来给燃烧的房子扇风的吗？你不会知道如果你听到

20020439.English_Text: I'm here to put out the lights. Here's a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Cobweb</>.
20020439.Chinese_Text: 我是来灭火的.所以，这是<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>蜘蛛网</>.

20020441.Original_Text: 근데 공짜로는 안 되죠. <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>에레다 문파</>를 찾고 있어요.
20020441.English_Text: But not for free. I'm looking for <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ereda Clan</>.
20020441.Chinese_Text: 但它不是免费的. <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>我在寻找艾瑞达氏族</>.

20020442.Original_Text: 으음... 좋다. 알려주마. 대신! 위험해도 난 모른다?
20020442.English_Text: Ummm... good. Let me know. Instead! I don't know if it's dangerous?
20020442.Chinese_Text: 嗯……很好.不要告诉我反而！不知道有没有危险

20020443.Original_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>동부 생태 조사림</>으로 가보면 만날 수도 있을 게다. \n가끔 그곳에 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>에레다 문파원</>들이 나타난다는 이야기를 들은 적이 있어.
20020443.English_Text:
You might find it if you go to <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Eastern Ecological Forest</>.
Sometimes there <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Ere I've heard stories that all members of the clan appear.
20020443.Chinese_Text:
如果你去<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>东方生态林业</>，你可能会找到. 
有时听说<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>艾瑞达氏族成员</>出现在那里.

20020444.English_Text:
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Eastern Ecological Forest</>... 
Ah, here <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Cobweb</> >Hey. Thank you, Mister!
20020444.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>东方生态林业</>... 
哦，这里是<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>蜘蛛网</>.谢谢叔叔！

20020445.English_Text: (You can see the structure. Let's go check it out)
20020445.Chinese_Text: (你可以看到结构.我们去看看)

20020446.Original_Text: 또 보네, <textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>. <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>천신제례</>를 준비하고 있다는 소문은 들었어.
20020446.English_Text: See you again, <textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>. <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Heavenly Rites</> I heard rumors that they were preparing.
20020446.Chinese_Text: 再见，<textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>.我听说<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>天神节</>正在筹备中.

20020448.Original_Text: 다 방법이 있지. 그렇다면 우리 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>금경철문</>은 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>금경철검</>을 빌려줘야겠네? 뭐 못 빌려줄 것도 없지. 대신 조건이 있어.
20020448.English_Text: There is a way. Then our <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Golden Iron Gate</> is <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Golden Iron Sword</> Should I borrow it? There is nothing I can't lend. Instead, there is a condition.
20020448.Chinese_Text: 有办法.那么我们应该<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>金剑</>借用<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>金剑</>吗？我没有什么不能借给你的.相反，有条件.

20020450.Original_Text: 지금 우리는 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>환영혼불</>로 강철을 제련하는 법에 대해 연구하고 있어. \n연구에 필요한 재료를 구해줘.
20020450.English_Text:
Now we're working on how to smelt steel with <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Illusion Soulfire</>.
Get us the materials we need for research.
20020450.Chinese_Text:
现在我们正在研究如何使用 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>幻影魂火</> 熔炼钢铁. 
 获取研究所需的材料.

20020452.Original_Text: 자, 이 정도면 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>환영혼불</>은 충분하고... <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>환영혼불</>을 정제할 때 쓸 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>식물의 진액</>이 필요해. 마침 주변에 투연초도 많네. 그럼 부탁해.
20020452.English_Text: Okay, this is enough <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Illustrated Soul Light</>... <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Illustrated Soul Light< I need <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>plant essence</> to use when refining</>. There are also a lot of turmeric plants around.
20020452.Chinese_Text: 现在，这足以让 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>幻影魂火</>... 我需要 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>植物精华</> 才能使用.周围还有很多姜黄植物.那么请

20020453.Original_Text: (<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>투연초의 진액</> 말고도 더 필요한 게 있냐고 묻는다)
20020453.English_Text: (Ask if you need anything other than <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Essence of Tobacco</>)
20020453.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>请问除了秋渊町的精华还有什么需要的</>)

20020454.Original_Text: 음... 아직까지는...? \n연구가 진행되는 상황에 따라 한두 가지 더 부탁할 수도 있으니 그렇게 알아둬.
20020454.English_Text:
Um... yet...? 
I may ask you one or two more things depending on the progress of the research, so keep that in mind.
20020454.Chinese_Text:
嗯……还是……？ 
 根据研究的进展，我可能会再要求一两件事，所以请注意.

20020455.English_Text: Thank you. You saved me more steadily than I thought.
20020455.Chinese_Text: 谢谢.你救了我比我想象的要多.

20020456.English_Text: (Now asks if you can lend me <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Golden Sword</>)
20020456.Chinese_Text: (现在问你能不能借给我<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>金剑</>)

20020457.Original_Text: 그럼 물론. 네가 물건을 구하는 사이, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>강철주먹</>이 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>예도항</>에 다녀왔어.
20020457.English_Text: Of course. While you're shopping, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Steelfist</>is <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Yedohang</> I've been to.
20020457.Chinese_Text: 那么当然.购物时，<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>钢拳</>去了<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>野都港</>.

20020460.Original_Text: 흠집 하나 없이 돌려줘야 해. 그럼 무운을 빌어.
20020460.English_Text: You must return it with no blemishes. Good luck then.
20020460.Chinese_Text: 它必须无划痕地退回.那么祝你好运

20020461.Original_Text: 하하, 그런 것은 아닙니다. 그저 권유일 뿐입니다. \n저도 일단 개인적인 용무 좀 보고 오겠습니다.
20020461.English_Text:
Haha, it's not like that. It's just a recommendation. 
I'll come to see some personal business first.
20020461.Chinese_Text:
哈哈，不是这样的.这只是一个建议. 
 我先来看看私事.

20020462.English_Text: Ummm... <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Biryuha</> I'll think about the death penalty!
20020462.Chinese_Text: 嗯... <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>飞羽</> 我会考虑死刑！

20020463.Original_Text: 말이라도 그렇게 해주시니 고맙네요. 하하. \n일이 정리되면 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>붉은 비탈</>에서 기다리고 있겠습니다. 그럼 이만.
20020463.English_Text:
Thank you for saying that, haha. 
I'll be waiting for you at <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Red Slope</> when things are sorted out.
20020463.Chinese_Text:
谢谢你这么说.哈哈. 
整理好后，我会在<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>红坡</>等你.然后来吧

20020464.English_Text: A letter from the low tide

20020465.Original_Text: (조, 조금은 시끄러운 것 같지만 이곳이 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>참고요 숲</>인 것 같다)
20020465.English_Text: (Joe, it seems a little noisy, but this place seems to be <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Note: Forest</>)
20020465.Chinese_Text: (乔，好像有点吵，不过这个地方好像是<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>注：森林</>)
